TopicTitle: BDAc Challenges: GDJ's Top Gun Extreme Tournament

Articles.Content:
No videos yet, but Dr. Tricky's Dorito has beaten Bob_Saget54's Shrike  2-0 (altho' it was a pretty hard battle. Both battles could have gone either way in some parts). Congratulations to Dr.Tricky!

Final round is going as we speak. The final 3 planes will get 2 battles each.

This is about as fair as I can make it. Each plane will have two chances to progress or be eliminated.

EDIT: Filming is done, and each plane had two battles and they fought each other.

1st battle: TSOJ 2 vs SuicidalInsanity 1
2nd battle: TSOJ 0  vs Dr. Tricky 2
3rd battle Dr. Tricky 1 vs SuicidalInsanity. 2

Each participant had one win, one loss.

I'm calling this challenge closed with a three-way tie. Each plane here is as good as the other, and are excellent in their own rights.

I will post all the remaining videos today and everything will be updated this afternoon.


Thank you all for your participation! All the planes in this entire competition were very inventive, and were true fighter planes!

Edited January 7, 2017 by GDJ
This thread is now closed by GDJ's request
